message: I propose a fair split, considering your future losses are much greater than mine. Hope you agree!
Alice, my turn. While your proposal acknowledges the inflation, I believe a 60/40 split is more reflective of the risk I'm taking by potentially delaying the agreement. Let's be reasonable.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm willing to go slightly higher.  Let's split the money 60/40, with me taking 60% to account for our inflation rates.  This offers a better outcome for both of us in the long run.
